name: Magnet Vox
description:
DISCLAIMER: You need Love2D installed [https://love2d.org/] to run the game because I screwed up when packaging the executable.

If you still run into an issue, see if this fixes the problem:

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10406679/executing-love2d-scripts

Push and pull two magnets to the beat and grab notes as they come down. 

A first time game jam project. 

Programming: Ivan Feng, Shawn Lu, Jibin Alex, and Nick Nadeau 

Music and SFX: Ivan Feng, Shawn Lu 

Art: Shawn Lu
